mapper.update: update t_user_info set Usr_Name=#{usrName}, Usr_Pwd=#{usrPwd}, Usr_Sex=#{usrSex}, Usr_Phone=#{usrPhone}, Usr_Role=#{usrRole}, Station_Port=#{stationPort}, Station_Name=#{stationName} where Usr_Id=#{usrId}
update t_user_info set Del_State=0 where Usr_Id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.company_name from t_user_info a left join t_dic_company b on a.Usr_Role=b.id where Del_State=1
select count(Usr_Name) from t_user_info where Usr_Name=#{name} and Del_State=1
select count(Usr_Name) from t_user_info where Usr_Name=#{name} and Usr_Id !=#{id} and Del_State=1

SELECT tui.*,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(ss.Station_Longitude,"-",ss.Station_Latitude)) as lnglat,tdc.station_port as stationPort,tdc.company_name,tdc.groups,GROUP_CONCAT(ss.station_Name) stationName FROM t_user_info tui LEFT JOIN t_dic_company tdc on tui.Usr_Role=tdc.id LEFT JOIN station_site ss on FIND_IN_SET(ss.Station_Port,tdc.station_port) WHERE tui.Usr_Name = #{name} and tui.Del_State=1

SELECT tui.*,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(ss.Station_Longitude,"-",ss.Station_Latitude)) as lnglat FROM t_user_info tui LEFT JOIN station_site ss on FIND_IN_SET(ss.Station_Port,tui.Station_Port) WHERE Usr_Id = #{usrId} and tui.Del_State=1
